main event: An observer reported seeing a reddish-orange object over Colorado Springs, Colorado, that moved erratically and was visible for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared solid and was described as having a blinking red light on the bottom., The observer noted that the object hovered at tree-top level before suddenly accelerating at a very high speed., The object made no sound and showed no visible means of propulsion., The sighting occurred under clear weather conditions in a mountainous area., The observer had previously seen a similar object on Dec 19, 1960.
sighted object: reddish-orange object with a blinking red light
witness description: An individual who reported the sighting to the Air Force.
